channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump denies report that he plans to scale down tariff approach — live coverage
The truth about how many transgender kids are using hormones and puberty blockers, according to a new study
item.description: The study finds that despite fears of their over-medicalization, transgender adolescents are only very rarely prescribed hormones and puberty blockers...

item.title: Trump rips report saying his team may water down tariffs, the centerpiece of his re-election campaign
item.description: Sources told the Washington Post that preliminary discussions on tariffs have focused on certain sectors deemed key to national or economic security.

item.title: FuboTV shares rocket 140% on planned combination with Disney’s Hulu + Live TV

item.description: Roborock’s Saros Z70 comes with AI and a robotic arm.

item.title: Middle America dominates the best places to live—and the East Coast doesn’t even make the top five
item.description: Ann Arbor, Michigan might have far fewer songs to its name than New York, New York— but it appears as if the later city lags behind when it comes to q...

item.title: Klarna CEO says he feels ‘gloomy’ because AI is developing so quickly it’ll soon be able to do his entire job
item.description: “My work to me is a super important part of who I am,” Sebastian Siemiatowski said.

item.title: Trump’s tariff policy appears to claim a victim as Canada’s Trudeau resigns
